Detailed Description

The TREX agent.

Defines a TREX agent and some utilities that helps to manipulate it. It provides also two generic clocks to allow basic agent execution. All of these are provided by the library lib/libTREXagent

Author:
Conor McGann & Frederic Py <fpy@mbari.org>

Variable Documentation

Clock::xml_factory::declare<StepClock> decl("StepClock") [related, inherited]

Clock XML factor declaration for StepClock.

This variable provides an access to the Clock XML factory to allow automatic parsing of StepClock from xml. The tag associated to this is "Step"

See also:
TREX::transaction::Clock::xml_factory

Clock::xml_factory::declare<RealTimeClock> rt_decl("RealTime") [related, inherited]

Clock XML factor declaration for RealTimeClock.

This variable provides an access to the Clock XML factory to allow automatic parsing of RealTimeClock from xml. The tag associated to this is "RealTime"

See also:
TREX::transaction::Clock::xml_factory
